data.name: WWE.com Dark Mode
data.description: WWE.com in a full dark mode.  Supported for WWE.com news, superstars, shows, and tickets webpages.  Not for WWE Shop or WWE Network.

data.name: whatsapp seguro
data.description:
Ocultando conversaciones de los contactos de whastapp dise√±ados solo para mostrar la foto y nombre de la persona que te envia un mensague, el mensage estara oculto por privacidad.
Dise√±ado para el area de trabajo, familia y etc. Cuando estas trabajando con una sola conversacion las demas estaran ocultas para que nadie mas pueda ver lo que otras personas te envian y por seguridad su nombre estara oculto, su foto del contacto estara borrosa, solamente podra estar visible cuando la conversacion este activa en caso contrario estaran ocultas y borrosas.

user.name: pixelqiwi
user.about:
I am a self proclaimed web-designer with a passion to make every site more comfortable for me to use. I also have my own website that I have made from scratch, with my own hands. No Bootstrap, no templates, only me, my text editor and my trusty CSS textbook. 

My styles are all Public Domain because it's not like I own the CSS of the website anyway. Feel free to throw some pennies my way though, that's always appreciated!

data.name: Lichess Board: Blue and Marble
data.description: The classical blue and marble look, but with a lighter blue square to have more contrast with the black pieces.

data.name: Custom skribbl.io
data.description:
Custom skribbl / skribbl.io / skribblio

Features:
Sleek transparent design
Custom background wallpapers
Custom accent color on select elements
Cleaner design

Check out my other styles:
https://userstyles.org/users/812884

I have a Discord channel for easier feedback and discussions about the styles: https://discord.gg/Emv2rtk

Theme by Zhou Yahui

data.name: Just.game Naked Curvy
data.description:
This is the Naked Curvy NCoV19 edition for Just.game ( Curvy.One ) Steps on how to use User styles - 1. Visit 'Stylus' Brave/Chrome extension https://greasyfork.org/en/help/installing-user-styles 2. Click on 'Install as user style' button 3. Stylus will then handle user styles according to preferences
Just.game is a blueprint for the concept of Autodecentricity, an idea so astoundingly disruptive that it's guaranteed to shape the future of software development. ‚ÄîTeam JUST
Brought to you by curvy.one
